name: Curse of the Blob
description:
A short metroidvania where you play as pirate-turned-enchanted blob, exploring a lost island in order to find the cure to the curse. You will have to use your own body as a weapon against the pirate skeletons haunting the caves of the island.

I was the sole programmer on this project, and I worked with a team of 4 designers and 5 artists.

The game is controller-only (the menus are mouse-compatible).
